meanings: (덧대다) apply, fix, put sth over[on] sth
(공급하다) supply (sth to sb / sb with sth), provide (sth for sb / sb with sth), (자금·경비 등을) pay, finance

vlive.korean: 제가 소근소근 대는 게 들렸나요? Did you hear me whispering? 듣기 View video 정세운(Jeong Sewoon) : 세운 Says. #1
저는 혼자 조잘조잘대는게 재밌는 것 같아요. chattering by myself. 듣기 View video GOT7 : 진영 영재
그래서... -그르렁 대는 게 많죠? -네. And so... - Like a growl? - Yeah. 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [Replay] MAMAMOO Moon Byul & Whee In’s 마마무 문별&휘인 X 같이먹어요
vlive.english: And so... - Like a growl? - Yeah.

vlive.korean: 저 깜짝 놀랐습니다. 괜히 그런 수식어를 대는 게 아니었어. I was really surprised. This is why you have that nickname. 듣기 View video V Special : SBS파워FM 오늘같은밤 러브블러썸: V데이트 정진운X이호정
vlive.english: I was really surprised. This is why you have that nickname.

vlive.korean: 나 이거 근데 대고 있을 게... I need something to make this stand. 듣기 View video TWICE : 💜
vlive.english: I need something to make this stand.
